page.title: 08Gardens in Viewpark area
page.content: Some people round about my home do not take care of their gardens and just neglect them and let rubbish coll- ect. Most do look after their garden and there are some which are really nice and colourful. Popular flowers are pansies, tulips, roses and daffodils. Some grow shrubs and trees if they have room. Vegetables are usually grown in back or side gardens. People in Uddingston without gardens can get an allotment to use. Large houses there have big lawns and some have orchards and men hired to work in them. I think that people in Viewpark would like to have some small public gardens as in Uddingston. These would help to make the place look much bett- er.
